benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class BasicCrimeInfoFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.BasicCrimeInfoFragment

  • public class BasicCrimeInfoFragment
extends Fragment
    BasicCrimeInfoFragment is a UI fragment class used to display the basic crime info.

    Basic crime info is

    • crime index
    • crime trend
    • crime solved ratio

      This fragment is reused across the activities that need to display the basic crime info.

    Author:
    Tom
